Description.Name: Marsden III
Description.Details: The Marsden III Main Battle Tank was introduced by jointly by Pafftek Industries and Arcturan Arms in 3069 to improve upon and replace its venerable predecessor. The Weapon Systems received a refresh, with the foward glacis receiving 2 MML3 launchers which share one ton each of SRM and LRM munitions. While keeping the Lulabin Experimental class 10 autocannon in basic form, it is actually a new production version from Pafftek Industries that has a triple ammo feed. One ton each Cluster, APFSDS Sabot and Dragonfire come standard. rounding out the warload for anti Battlearmor or infantry are 1 turret mounted and one hull mounted ER Small laser of a rotary variant. Two B-Pods are the final line of defense against swarming Battlearmor. All of this while pushing up the max speed and maintaing the same thick armor as before thanks to an XL Fusion 300 core and Ferro Fibrous armor being used. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 280 30 Left 260 30 Right 260 30 Rear 205 30 Turret 255 30 Total 1260 150

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
